name: palace gate
notes:
>this pattern can be downloaded also on [payhip][1] with  pay what you want option.

inspired by the main gate of buckingham palace, this design honours the memory of the late queen elizabeth ii.

---

**pattern features:**

- yardage for each colour: 25-35 grams of c1 (light pink) and 40-55 grams of c2 (grey)
- knitted cuff down
- instructions written in metric and us terminology
- instructions written for magic loop but dpns can be used as well 
- four sizes: small (60 sts), medium (66 sts sts), large (72 sts) and extra-large (78 sts)
- strong heel
- charts but no written instructions for stranded colourwork
- pattern tech edited by helena kahan


  [1]: https://payhip.com/b/hrpyy
